name: Terminal Sickness
storyline: A story driven text adventure following a mother's survival after the outbreak of a global pandemic. You play a female protagonist in a non-linear, text based adventure. The world is detailed, interactive and very dark.
summary:
A story driven text adventure following a mother's survival after the outbreak of a global pandemic.

You play a female protagonist in a non-linear, text based adventure. The world is detailed, interactive and very dark.
